TopicTitle: Mirroring parts without the need of grabbing them

Articles.Content:
I sometimes have this problem when I forget to enable SPH mirroring and end up grabbing a part, which I have to fine tune to make it look good and/or functional again. It would be much easier to just right-click something and choose "mirror this part", or whatever the option would be called.

Thanks.

Edited February 29, 2016 by Veeltch
I mean... I can see how this can be used, but it's really not that big of a deal to just grab it and press toggle the symmetry you need.
